procedural_details.technique: Leave vein in bed, lyse valves, ligate tributaries
procedural_details.valve_lysis: Hall or LeMaitre valvulotome (flexible or rigid)
procedural_details.tributary_management: Must ligate all to prevent AV fistula
procedural_details.complications: Residual AV fistula 5-10% (requires post-op surveillance and ligation)

citations.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.

clinical_pearls: In situ provides optimal proximal-to-distal size matching
Must ligate all tributaries to prevent AV fistula
Surveillance required to detect and ligate residual AVFs
